Operation 'playgrouping.apps.tokens.tags.createOrUpdate' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Added summary for quick reference, clarified the create/update semantics, specified the return value, and noted the token verification prerequisite for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Create or update tags for the user and app that are represented by the given token.
data.summary_suggestion: Create or update user and app tags
data.description_suggestion: Creates or updates tags associated with a specific user and app identified by the provided token. Tags are created if they don't exist, or updated if they already exist for the given app package and token combination. Returns the created or updated tags in the response. This operation requires a verified token.
data.reasoning: The operation lacks a summary entirely, making it difficult for AI agents to quickly understand its purpose. The description is minimal and doesn't explain the create-vs-update behavior, return value, or the requirement for token verification. Added summary for quick reference, clarified the create/update semantics, specified the return value, and noted the token verification prerequisite for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'playgrouping.apps.tokens.verify' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details. The operation lacks a summary, and while the description provides good context about the security purpose and prerequisite nature, it doesn't clearly specify what the operation returns on success or failure. Added a concise summary for quick AI agent reference, and enhanced the description to explicitly state the response behavior and error conditions, improving AI agent ability to determine when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Verify an API token by asserting the app and persona it belongs to. The verification is a protection against client-side attacks and will fail if the contents of the token don't match the provided values. A token must be verified before it can be used to manipulate user tags.
data.summary_suggestion: Verify API token for app and persona
data.description_suggestion: Verifies an API token by validating that it belongs to the specified app package and persona. This verification protects against client-side attacks by ensuring token contents match the provided values. Verification must succeed before the token can be used for tag manipulation operations. Returns a VerifyTokenResponse indicating successful verification, or fails with an error if token validation fails.
data.reasoning: The operation lacks a summary, and while the description provides good context about the security purpose and prerequisite nature, it doesn't clearly specify what the operation returns on success or failure. Added a concise summary for quick AI agent reference, and enhanced the description to explicitly state the response behavior and error conditions, improving AI agent ability to determine when and how to use this operation.
